thread.title_full: Waiting for The Weeknd? Selena Gomez a third wheel watching Super Bowl 51 with coupled-up pals - Daily Mail

title: Waiting for The Weeknd? Selena Gomez a third wheel watching Super Bowl 51 with coupled-up pals - Daily Mail
text: comments Selena Gomez was a third wheel Super Bowl Sunday, as she spent the day with friends without her boyfriend, The Weeknd. The 24-year-old shared a series of clips from her day on Snapchat, as she hung out at a residence with three couples, all looking in a wonderful mood. In the clip, Selena was seated on the floor while the trio of duos took up space canoodling on a large sectional couch. Scroll below for video Third wheel: Selena Gomez, 24, flew solo for Super Bowl Sunday, though she was surrounded by friends. The dark-haired diva is currently dating The Weeknd, 26 Good times: The stunning songstress looked to be having a wonderful time in spite of her third wheel status Chilling: Selena chose an intimate day with friends over the loud hype emanating from Houston Selena, who looked amazing in a long-sleeved loose sweater and black pants, didn't seem to be too upset, as there doesn't look to be any trouble in paradise between the musical mates. The former Disney diva and the Starboy sensation recently embarked on a lavish Italian vacation that E! reported ran nearly a quarter of a million dollars. The Love You Like a Love Song singer - who was famously involved in a years-long relationship with another Canadian music star, Justin Bieber - fell 'hard and fast' for the 26-year-old Grammy-winner, whose real name is Abel Makkonen Tesfaye, US Weekly reported. That's Amore: The musical stars recently embarked on an Italian vacation that cost nearly $250K An insider told the magazine that the Come & Get It singer's romantic feelings for her beau of over a month are 'serious,' noting that the beautiful brunette is 'even wearing [The Weeknd's] necklace.' While the Kill Em with Kindness artist is up a necklace, she's down an Instagram follower, as the Party Monster's ex-gal pal, model Bella Hadid, unfollowed the Hands to Myself songstress after she hooked up with The Weeknd shortly after Bella and the recording artist parted in November. Stunner: Selena glimmered in a silver gown at Vanity Fair's Oscar Party last year Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
